attributes.action: stop any further closures of royal air forces bases and stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stopping the closures of raf stations make sure the country's sky's is fully protected by the raf and also get the raf to combat uk air terrorism for example plane bombings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
